product_name: Moving Comfort Jubralee Sports Bra - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Moving Comfort Jubralee sports bra boasts high-performance fabric and sophisticated construction to offer comfortable support for high-impact aerobic activities. Soft polyester/spandex fabric wicks moisture away from skin. Seam-free interior cups increase comfort, enhance shaping with a slight contour and offer a bit of modesty. Built-in support on sides and under bust minimizes up-and-down and side-to-side motion. Straps adjust at front easily, using a concealed rip-and-stick closure. Rear closure features soft padding and 3 hook-and-eye loops to adjust the fit; bonded straps reduce chafing. Closeout.
short_description: The Moving Comfort Jubralee sports bra boasts high-performance fabric and sophisticated construction to offer comfortable support for high-impact aerobic activities.
